name: places/ChIJP9TjK5FZwokRA3xZtj4k8K4
formattedAddress: 29 Washington Square W #1C, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 29 Washington Square W #1C, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text:
As of today I am choosing to stop seeing this dentist. I’ve been coming to them before they were on Waverly place. At least 8 years now. I’ve referred friends to
them and have been very loyal.

For the first time, I’ve had to cancel and reschedule an appointment. As for the past 3 years I’ve been going to them even though I live in a different state. They refuse to waive the fee because they can’t make MONEY during my time slot. They basically said they cannot fill the slot. So if that what it’s about I don’t want to give you my business and will go elsewhere.

I did like my experience when I was constantly met by Dr. Lane. But now there’s so many people there it’s different person each time. And it’s clear that this practice cares more about image and money than they do patients. I’m all about growing your practice but don’t step on those who helped you get there.

text.text:
As of today I am choosing to stop seeing this dentist. I’ve been coming to them before they were on Waverly place. At least 8 years now. I’ve referred friends to
them and have been very loyal.

For the first time, I’ve had to cancel and reschedule an appointment. As for the past 3 years I’ve been going to them even though I live in a different state. They refuse to waive the fee because they can’t make MONEY during my time slot. They basically said they cannot fill the slot. So if that what it’s about I don’t want to give you my business and will go elsewhere.

I did like my experience when I was constantly met by Dr. Lane. But now there’s so many people there it’s different person each time. And it’s clear that this practice cares more about image and money than they do patients. I’m all about growing your practice but don’t step on those who helped you get there.

originalText.text: First time patient and will never return again. I went for a simple cleaning and checkup and was told my insurance will cover all charges. They did they did a long list of x-rays, radiographic images and other procedures which I was told was necessary(I never asked for them) as I was a first time patient and was covered in my insurance. These tests were very uncomfortable with the assistant pushing a huge instrument in your mouth bleeding your gums. After 1 month they sent a bill of $729 to my insurance which denied 50% of it and told me they are not part of the network and the charges were above the rate or not necessary.  GOOGLE employees be aware they are NOT covered in our insurance even though their website and receptionist says they are.

originalText.text: My all-time favorite dentist. Every single person working here is so kind and welcoming. Going to the dentist isn’t necessarily an enjoyable experience, however at All Smiles I actually enjoy my time there on every single occasion. They’re particularly good at what they do and the atmosphere is pleasant - in my opinion going to the dentist couldn’t get better.

They’re particularly good at what they do and the atmosphere is pleasant - in my opinion going to the dentist couldn’t get better.

originalText.text: first time patient here and everything was so smooth start to finish! everyone I interacted with was so kind and efficient. I felt they all took the time to answer my questions and concerns and did not feel rushed. really glad to have found my dentist in the city!!

originalText.text: I love this practice — everyone is always kind and professional. Today I had a great cleaning from Subah, who was so gentle. Dr. Jagirdar really took her time with me and made sure all my questions were answered. Everyone who works here is lovely, which makes the experience of going to the dentist a pleasant one!
